item.title: Lucas Boistard - Lead Developper
item.description:
I'm a 27 years old lead Developer with 4+ years of experience in crafting dynamic web applications and driving impactful solutions.
Passionate about deeply understanding customer challenges and collaborating with teammates to design and deliver impactful applications.

Currently living in Margency, Val d'Oise:

💻 I love making small tech project at home to help me automate redundant stuff (such as choosing what to eat next week).
🏃🏻 I practice trail running and enjoy spending time running in the woods near by where I live.


French ( Native )
English ( Fluent )


Positivity: Even in complex situation or period of tension, it's important to share a positive attitude to motivate people to move forward.
Teamwork : Be able to work with a team and as a team to ship great products.
Resilience : bounce back quickly from challenges.


📂 Version control Git Github (for merge requests, code reviews...)
💻 Development and Framework Python Django FastAPI Javascript Typescript ReactJS Express Koa Shell Java 🏗️ Infrastructure Docker Kubernetes
💾 Database/Message Broker MongoDB PostgreSQL Neo4J ElasticSearch Redis Milvus (Vector store)
🧪 Monitoring and Testing Grafana Cypress Mocha Chai Jest


August 2022 - Present
Full-stack Developper and then Lead Developper

Build, test and deploy the Web Application
Meet customers to understands their daily issues and design product guidelines to help them with our tools.
In charge of the vector database development for AI features (such as hybrid search, RAG)
Guarantee the quality, architecture and durability of the codebase
Integrate AI functionality inside the web-application and monitor their usage.
Code refactoring and typescript migration of the codebase

October 2020 - July 2022
Backend developper and then full-stack developper

Build the API for an OCR to help energy supplier evaluate the CO2 emission of a project
Deploy and manage the stability and scalability of the SAAS
Design and implement new features

January 2020 - March 2021

Implement Image analisys algorithm to compute the surface of head arteries.
Provide 3D manipulable shape of the blood vessels structure of the Aortic Arch for mechanical thrombectomy operations.
Calculating the surface area of ​​brain blood vessels for bilateral sinus stenosis pathologies
Help write a published medical academic paper with Hôpital Pitié Salpêtrière
https://www.researchgate.net/publication/352734067_Global_collapse_of_the_dural_sinuses_after_venous_stenting_in_idiopathic_intracranial_hypertension

February 2019 - July 2019

Design and deploy a market data simulator tool to help operational team to evaluate customers requirements


september 2019 - september 2021

Specialisation in Biotechnological and Computer Science applied to Medical field
Machine Learning & Deep learning fundamentals
Computer vision
Big data basics
Medical hardware and software

september 2016 - september 2019

Fundamental physics and mathematics
Fundamental informatic and algorithmic
Finance & management
